title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby make the following
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Signs) (Speed
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Signs) (Speed 

limits) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited road traffic (signs) (speed limits) regulation 2024

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby make the following
heading: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 7 February 2025.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 7 February 2025.

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby make the following
heading: 3. The Road Traffic (Signs) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 200 of 2024) are
text_raw:
3. The Road Traffic (Signs) Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 200 of 2024) are 

amended— 

(a) 

in Regulation 29, by substituting for paragraphs (4) and (5) the 
following: 

“(4) An alternative design for speed limit sign number RUS 
042 set out in Part 1 of Schedule 3 may be provided to indicate— 

(a) 

in respect of a local road, the local roads speed limit 
of 60 kilometres per hour, or 

(b) where special speed limit bye-laws specify the special 
speed limit of 60 kilometres per hour in respect of a 
local road or part of a local road in a built-up area, 
that special speed limit. 

(5) 

The alternative design for speed limit sign RUS 042 
referred to in paragraph (4) consists of a white disc with a black 
border displaying diagonal parallel lines in black, the dimensions 
and design of which are set out in Part 1 of Schedule 3.”, 

and 

(b) 

in Schedule 3, by substituting for Part 1 the following: 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [618] 3 

“Part 1 

General Speed Limit Signs 

Regulation 29(1), (2) and (5) 

RUS 039: 
120km/h Speed Limit 

RUS 040: 
100km/h Speed Limit 

RUS 041: 
80km/h Speed Limit 

RUS 042: 
60km/h Speed Limit 

RUS 042: 
Alternative Design 

RUS 043: 
50km/h Speed Limit 

RUS 064: 
40km/h Speed Limit 

RUS 044: 
30km/h Speed Limit 

RUS 065: 
20km/h Speed Limit 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [618] 

Note:

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby make the following
heading: 2. Except for traffic sign number RUS 064, where it is desired to repeat the
text_raw:
2. Except for traffic sign number RUS 064, where it is desired to repeat the 
speed limit along the length of a road, part, carriageway or lane to which the 
speed limit applies, the diameter of the sign may be reduced to 900 millimetres, 
750 millimetres, 600 millimetres, 450 millimetres or 300 millimetres. Where it 
is desired to repeat traffic sign number RUS 064 along the length of a road, part 
carriageway or lane to which the speed limit applies, the diameter of the sign 
may be reduced to 450 millimetres or 300 millimetres.
text_norm: 2 except traffic sign number ru 064 desired repeat speed limit along length road part carriageway lane speed limit applies diameter sign may reduced 900 millimetre 750 millimetre 600 millimetre 450 millimetre 300 millimetre desired repeat traffic sign number ru 064 along length road part carriageway lane speed limit applies diameter sign may reduced 450 millimetre 300 millimetre

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby make the following
heading: 3. A speed limit sign can be mounted on its own or on a backing board or
text_raw:
3. A speed limit sign can be mounted on its own or on a backing board or 
as part of a larger traffic sign or in combination with other regulatory, warning 
or information traffic signs.
text_norm: 3 speed limit sign mounted backing board part larger traffic sign combination regulatory warning information traffic sign

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby make the following
heading: 4. An alternative design for speed limit sign number RUS 042 may be
text_raw:
4. An alternative design for speed limit sign number RUS 042 may be 

provided to indicate— 

(a) 

in respect of a local road, the local roads speed limit of 60 
kilometres per hour, or 

(b) where special speed limit bye-laws specify the special speed limit 
of 60 kilometres per hour in respect of a local road or part of a 
local road in a built-up area, that special speed limit.
text_norm: 4 alternative design speed limit sign number ru 042 may provided indicate-- (a) respect local road local road speed limit 60 kilometre per hour (b) special speed limit bye-laws specify special speed limit 60 kilometre per hour respect local road part local road built-up area special speed limit

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby make the following
heading: 5. Speed limit sign number RUS 065 may be mounted on its own or, on a
text_raw:
5. Speed limit sign number RUS 065 may be mounted on its own or, on a 
grey backing board as part of a larger traffic sign in combination with appropriate 
warning or information traffic signs.”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Transport, 

6 November, 2024. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [618]

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 351 of 2020)), hereby make the following
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Road Traffic (Signs) Regulations 2024 to 
designate the alternative design previously used for RUS 041 (80 kilometres per 
hour) as an alternative design for RUS 042 (60 kilometres per hour). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [618] 7
